short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts currency using Armenian banks' exchange rates. Supports AMD, USD, EUR, RUR, GBP, CHF, CAD, JPY, AUD, GEL, XAU currencies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get instant currency conversions with the Currency Converter (Armenian Banks) Chrome extension.
Simply select an amount and currency and click on the extension icon to convert quickly, or just click it and use it as it is.
It supports major currencies like AMD, USD, EUR, GBP, and more, with options for buy/sell rates and cash/non-cash transactions.
